TopicTitle: New and Old All at Once

Articles.Content:
Hello, there! I'm new to the forums, in the sense that this is pretty much my first actual account, but I have at least 5,000 hours on KSP, and I've been playing since maybe .21 came out, so I'm not new in that sense.
I hope to become a more active member of the forums as time passes, and maybe I'll be able to make myself a prominent member? Who knows, only time can tell.
-Shmike the Pyro (Newly-Hired Kerbalnaut)

Hello ShmikeTP, and welcome to the forums!

Looking forward to your involvement with the community and to seeing what time will tell.

Happy landings!

WHALE CALM TO ZE FORUMS! Enjoy your stay!

-SPAddict
Cant wait to see what you bring here!
